pullrequest.title: adding/moving multi-model interactions into vrc plugin

content.raw:
The crash was caused by not using scoped names when calling GetSensor. This is fixed in 3facace, in which case inserting a second drc_robot will not crash the simulation, though it will not have any controllers, so it falls over with numerous ROS error messages.
~~~
Error [MultiSenseSLPlugin.cpp:81] spindle link not found, plugin will stop loading
[ INFO] [1356055726.085732499, 6.694000000]: starting gazebo_ros_controller_manager plugin in ns: 
[ INFO] [1356055726.085836633, 6.694000000]: imu plugin missing <serviceName>, defaults to /default_imu
[ INFO] [1356055726.085928011, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <frameName>, defaults to world
[ INFO] [1356055726.086009077, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <xyzOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086045449, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <rpyOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086080011, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <gaussianNoise>, defaults to 0.0
[ INFO] [1356055726.086113033, 6.694000000]: imu plugin missing <xyzOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086141620, 6.694000000]: imu plugin missing <rpyOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086274765, 6.694000000]: Callback thread id=0x7ffacc0010e0
[ERROR] [1356055726.087384941, 6.694000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/default_imu]
[ INFO] [1356055726.088726049, 6.695000000]: gazebo controller manager plugin is waiting for model URDF in parameter [/robot_description] on the ROS param server.
[ INFO] [1356055726.190001584, 6.755000000]: gazebo controller manager got urdf from param server, parsing it...
[ERROR] [1356055726.289500760, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/list_controllers]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289619810, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/list_controller_types]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289743658, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/load_controller]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289777695, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/unload_controller]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289809461, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/switch_controller]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289838830, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/reload_controller_libraries]
~~~
content.html:
The crash was caused by not using scoped names when calling GetSensor. This is fixed in 3facace, in which case inserting a second drc_robot will not crash the simulation, though it will not have any controllers, so it falls over with numerous ROS error messages.

Error [MultiSenseSLPlugin.cpp:81] spindle link not found, plugin will stop loading
[ INFO] [1356055726.085732499, 6.694000000]: starting gazebo_ros_controller_manager plugin in ns: 
[ INFO] [1356055726.085836633, 6.694000000]: imu plugin missing <serviceName>, defaults to /default_imu
[ INFO] [1356055726.085928011, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <frameName>, defaults to world
[ INFO] [1356055726.086009077, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <xyzOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086045449, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <rpyOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086080011, 6.694000000]: p3d plugin missing <gaussianNoise>, defaults to 0.0
[ INFO] [1356055726.086113033, 6.694000000]: imu plugin missing <xyzOffset>, defaults to 0s
[ INFO] [1356055726.086141620, 6.694000000]: imu plugin missing <rpyOffset>, defaults to 0s

[ERROR] [1356055726.289743658, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/load_controller]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289777695, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/unload_controller]
[ERROR] [1356055726.289809461, 6.782000000]: Tried to advertise a service that is already advertised in this node [/pr2_controller_manager/switch_controller]
